CE - Expenses Form submission send to CE
CE - Rejected Email to CE CMA

fieldUpdates.formula:
IF(
( Education_Record__r.Date_of_Event_Start__c ) < Date(2014,1,1), 0.565, IF( AND(Education_Record__r.Date_of_Event_Start__c > Date(2013,12,31), Education_Record__r.Date_of_Event_Start__c < Date(2016,1,1)), 0.56, IF( AND(Education_Record__r.Date_of_Event_Start__c > Date(2016,01,01), Education_Record__r.Date_of_Event_Start__c < Date(2016,12,31)), 0.54, IF(Education_Record__r.Date_of_Event_Start__c > Date (2017,12,31), Case( Clinical_Educator_Name__r.CurrencyIsoCode , 'USD', 0.545, 'CAD', 0.55, 0.545), Case( Clinical_Educator_Name__r.CurrencyIsoCode , 'USD', 0.535 , 'CAD' , 0.545, 0.535) ))))
fieldUpdates.name: CE - Update Mil_Rate

fieldUpdates.formula:
IF ( ISPICKVAL(Lab_Role__c,"Clinical Lead"), Case(CurrencyIsoCode,"USD",980*T_days__c,1284*T_days__c ), IF ( ISPICKVAL(Lab_Role__c,"Faculty"), Case(CurrencyIsoCode,"USD",500 * T_days__c,660*T_days__c ), IF ( ISPICKVAL(Lab_Role__c,"Expert Faculty"), Case(CurrencyIsoCode,"USD",800 * T_days__c,1048*T_days__c ), IF ( ISPICKVAL(Lab_Role__c,"Proficient Faculty"), Case(CurrencyIsoCode,"USD",700 * T_days__c,917*T_days__c ), IF ( ISPICKVAL(Lab_Role__c,"Proficient Airway"), Case(CurrencyIsoCode,"USD",700 * T_days__c,917*T_days__c ), IF ( ISPICKVAL(Lab_Role__c,"Airway"), Case(CurrencyIsoCode,"USD",500 * T_days__c,660*T_days__c ), IF ( ISPICKVAL(Lab_Role__c,"Expert Airway"), Case(CurrencyIsoCode,"USD",800 * T_days__c,1048*T_days__c ), IF ( ISPICKVAL(Lab_Role__c,"CE Prof. Development"), Case(CurrencyIsoCode,"USD",300 * T_days__c,396 ), IF ( ISPICKVAL(Lab_Role__c,"CA Prof. Development"), Case(CurrencyIsoCode,"USD",1500 * T_days__c,1980 )* T_days__c, IF( ISPICKVAL(Lab_Role__c,"Clinical Advisor"), Case(CurrencyIsoCode,"USD",3000 + 1500 * (T_days__c - 1),3960 + 1980* (T_days__c - 1)),
0 ))))))))))+IF(Cad_t__c,Case(CurrencyIsoCode,"USD",500,660),0) +IF(Pain__c, Case(CurrencyIsoCode,"USD",200,396),0) +IF(Oncontrol__c, Case(CurrencyIsoCode,"USD",200,396),0)
fieldUpdates.name: Cadaver Lab Calculation

fieldUpdates.description: Copies the Clinical Hourly Rate to the Ed Record. will keep original value if Rate changes on the Clinical Contact
fieldUpdates.formula:
IF( (Education_Record__r.Date_of_Event_Start__c ) < DATEVALUE("2015-09-15") , Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Hourly_Rate__c , ( IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c , "EZ-IO") , Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_EZ_IO__c >0, NOT(Includes(Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c, "Education"))),Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_EZ_IO__c,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c , "LMA MAD Nasal") , Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_LMA_MAD_Nasal__c >0),Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_LMA_MAD_Nasal__c ,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c , "CVC/PSI/MAC") , Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_CVC_Arterial__c >0),Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_CVC_Arterial__c ,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c , "Arterial") , Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_CVC_Arterial__c >0),Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_CVC_Arterial__c ,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c , "LMA Supreme") , Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_LMA_Supreme__c >0),Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_LMA_Supreme__c ,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c , "Rusch AirTraq") , Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_Rusch_AirTraq__c >0),Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_Rusch_AirTraq__c ,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c , "Rusch Quicktrach") , Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_Rusch_QuickTrach__c >0),Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_Rusch_QuickTrach__c ,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c , "OnControl") , Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_OnControl__c >0),Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_OnControl__c ,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c , "Pleur-evac") , Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_Pleur_evac__c >0),Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_Pleur_evac__c ,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c , "Percuvance") , Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_Percuvance__c >0),Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_Percuvance__c ,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c , "Implanted Ports") , Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_Implanted_Ports__c >0),Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_Implanted_Ports__c ,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c , "Acute Dialysis Catheters") , Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_Acute_Dialysis_Catheters__c >0),Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_Acute_Dialysis_Catheters__c ,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c , "AutoFuser") , Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_AutoFuser__c >0),Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_AutoFuser__c ,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c , "ISO-Gard") , Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_ISO_Gard__c >0),Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_ISO_Gard__c ,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c , "TALON") , Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_TALON__c >0),Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_TALON__c ,
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c, "Rate T-Pod Responder"), Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_T_Pod_Responder__c >0), Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Rate_T_Pod_Responder__c, Clinical_Educator_Name__r.Hourly_Rate__c ))))))))))))))))))
fieldUpdates.name: Clinical Hrly Rate

fieldUpdates.description: Change Ed Record record type to submitted
fieldUpdates.name: Ed Record change record type: Inservice

fieldUpdates.formula: If(AND(OR(Primary_Product__c = "Pleur-evac", Primary_Product__c = "Percuvance"), Inservice_Hours__c >4), 500, IF( AND(Primary_Product__c = "Autofuser", Inservice_Hours__c >4, Inservice_Hours__c <8) , 650, IF( AND(Primary_Product__c = "Autofuser", Inservice_Hours__c >8), 900, 0 )))
fieldUpdates.name: Inservice Exception Update

fieldUpdates.description: CE - Calculate Speaking Engagement when is created or updated
fieldUpdates.formula:
IF (Contains(CRF_Type__c,"Speaking Engagement"),
IF (Clinical_Educator_Name__r.RecordType.Name = "Clinical Educator", Case(CurrencyIsoCode,"USD",625,825), Case(CurrencyIsoCode,"USD",1500,1980)) ,0) * T_days__c
fieldUpdates.name: Speaking Engagement Calculation

fieldUpdates.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,"CAD"), "66209", IF(Education_Record__r.Record_Type_Name__c = "CMA Program","36861",
IF(Education_Record__r.Record_Type_Name__c = "Strategic Vascular Education Programs", "17054", IF( AND(CONTAINS(Education_Record__r.Record_Type_Name__c, "CMA"),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c,"VA"))), "36201",/*was "17647"*/ IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c,"EMS"), ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c,"VA")), Primary_Product__c = "EZ-IO"), "36212"/*was "17613 and 17676"*/, IF(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c,"IA"), "36307" , /*was "17627"*/ IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c,"EMS"), OR( Primary_Product__c = "LMA MAD Nasal", Primary_Product__c = "LMA Supreme", Primary_Product__c = "Rusch AirTraq", Primary_Product__c = "Rusch Quicktrach", Primary_Product__c = "TALON", Primary_Product__c = "T-Pod Responder")), "17634", IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c,"CMA"), ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c,"EMEA"), ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c,"APAC"), ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c,"LatAm")), "36201",/*was "17647"*/ IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c,"VA"), Primary_Product__c <> "EZ-IO"), "17654", IF( AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c,"Surgical"), Primary_Product__c = "Pleur-evac"), "44054", IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c,"Surgical"), Primary_Product__c <> "Pleur-evac"), "44057", IF(AND(Education_Record__r.Record_Type_Name__c = "Inservice Record", Primary_Product__c = "AutoFuser"),"48039", "17647"))))))))))))
fieldUpdates.name: Update Cost Center

fieldUpdates.formula: if( INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "PPT - Insertion, Care & Removal") , "PPT - Insertion, Care & Removal"& BR()," ")& if( INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "No PPT - Insertion, Care & Removal") , "No PPT - Insertion, Care & Removal"& BR()," ")& if( INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "Hands On Practice") , "Hands On Practice"& BR()," ")& if( INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "Brief Inservice/Demo (no PPT)") , "Brief Inservice/Demo (no PPT)"& BR()," ")& if( INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "Care & Removal Inservice") , "Care & Removal Inservice"& BR()," ")& if( INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "Cadaver Lab (Local)") , "Cadaver Lab (Local)"& BR()," ")& if( INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "Cadaver Lab (National)") , "Cadaver Lab (National)"& BR()," ")& if( INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "Cadaver Lab (Regional)") , "Cadaver Lab (Regional)"& BR()," ")& if( INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "Cadaver Lab (Military)") , "Cadaver Lab (Military)"& BR()," ")& if( INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "Speaking Engagement") , "Speaking Engagement"& BR()," ")& if( INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "Conference/Booth") , "Conference/Booth"& BR()," ")& if( INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "Preceptorship") , "Preceptorship"& BR()," ")& if( INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "Research") , "Research"& BR()," ")& if( INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "Education") , "Education"& BR()," ")& if( INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "Other") , "Other"," ")
fieldUpdates.name: Update Type of Inservice

rules.fullName: CE - Email Alert - EMS Education record
rules.description: This is not used anymore - 17Jan2018 ESC
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Submit CRF"), ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c, "EMS"), OR( Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name ="Inservice Record", Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name ="Education Record" ) )

rules.description: Copy RCEM email from Education Request for directing CRF to RCEM. Used for VA invoices <3000
Copies hourly rate from Clinical Contacts. Copies Mileage rate from education record

rules.fullName: CE - Field Updates - Cadaver Lab %2F Spaeking Engagement Rates
rules.formula: AND(NOT( Labs_Overwrite_Calculations__c) , OR( AND(Contains( Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name, "CMA"), OR(ISCHANGED( T_days__c ), ISCHANGED( Cad_t__c ), ISCHANGED( Pain__c ), ISCHANGED(Oncontrol__c), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Save") ) ), Contains( Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name, "CMA") ))

rules.description: Update the Clinical Mileage Rate on the CRF based on the Currency on the Education Contractor's profile. This will still allow for overrides in special circumstance by only updating if the Clinical Mileage rate is blank.
Change the record layout if Status = submitted
rules.formula:
AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Submit CRF"), OR(Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name ="CMA Procedural Lab Request" ,Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name ="CMA Record") , OR( INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "Cadaver Lab (Local)") , INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "Cadaver Lab (Other)" ), INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c , "Cadaver Lab (National)" ), INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c ,"Cadaver Lab (Regional)"), INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c ,"Cadaver Lab (Military)"),
INCLUDES( Education_Record__r.Type_of_In_Service__c ,"Humanitarian") ) )

rules.description: deactivating- mileage should be set based on the currency for the education contractor- not the education record. KE cases 00014193 and 00014161
Change the record layout if Status = submitted
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Submit CRF"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c, "VA")), OR( Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name ="Education Record", Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name ="Inservice Record" ) )
AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Submit CRF"), Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name ="Inservice Record", ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c, "VA"), Total_Expenses__c < 3000.00)

rules.fullName: Inservice Status %3D Submitted VA %3C3000 Ed Request
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Submit CRF"), Contains(Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name, "Education Program Request"), ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c, "VA"), Total_Expenses__c < 3000.00)

AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Submit CRF"), OR(Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name ="Inservice Record",Contains(Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name, "Education Program Request")), ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Business_Unit__c, "VA"), Total_Expenses__c >= 3000.00)

rules.description: Used in place of formula field on CE Reimbursement Records to record cost center for specific education records.
Change the record layout if Status = submitted
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Submit CRF"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c,"AutoFuser")), OR(Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name ="CMA Procedural Lab Request" , Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name ="CMA Record", Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name ="CMA Speaker Request" ) )

rules.description: Change the record layout if Status = submitted Autofuser
rules.formula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Submit CRF"), ISPICKVAL(Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c,"AutoFuser"), OR(Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name ="CMA Procedural Lab Request" , Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name ="CMA Record", Education_Record__r.RecordType.Name ="CMA Speaker Request" ) )

tasks.description: This is to verify that the email was sent with the link to the CE Expense form for this record.
tasks.subject: CE Expense Form Sent to CE
